data.news_body:
Fujiyama Power Systems Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 31/01/2026 inter alia to consider and approve 1. Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended December 31 2025 along with the Limited Review Report thereon; and

2. Issuance of equity shares pursuant to exercise of vested stock options and approval of Postal Ballot Notice to seek shareholders approval for the same.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Pursuant to the Code of Conduct for Prevention of Insider Trading of Fujiyama Power Systems Limited ("The Company") and SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 the Trading Window for dealing in securities of the Company has been closed for Designated persons their immediate relatives connected persons and insiders of the Company from Saturday 22 2025 till 48 hours after the declaration of the unaudited financial results of the Company.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Fujiyama Power Systems Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from November 20 2025 the Equity Shares of Fujiyama Power Systems Ltd (Scrip Code: 544613) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251119-39 dated November 19 2025.
